caption.p: EECP decreased cell viability in MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with lipopolysaccharide (LPS). (a)–(c) Effect of EECP on the cell viability of MDA-MB-231 cells stimulated with LPS at 12, 24, and 48 h, respectively. 25, 50, and 100 μg/mL: cells treated with EECP at 25, 50, and 100 μg/mL, respectively. Values represent the mean ± SEM from three independent experiments ( ∗ P < 0.05, ∗∗ P < 0.01 vs. control, n = 3).
